techmeme.title: SCOTUS agrees to consider whether a Texas law requiring porn sites to verify users' age violates the First Amendment, during its next term starting in October (Andrew Chung/Reuters)

Source: Google plans AI features for the Pixel 9 under the Google AI brand, like Pixel Screenshots, which lets users search their screenshots using on-device AI (Kamila Wojciechowska/Android Authority)
Sentient, an open-source AI development platform being built on Polygon, raised an $85M seed led by Founders Fund, Pantera Capital, and Framework Ventures (Jamie Crawley/CoinDesk)
Some YouTube employees detail internal deliberations about content relating to the Israel-Hamas war and accuse the company of inconsistent moderation (Paresh Dave/Wired)
A look at why Japan, due to its culture and employment laws, is not undergoing mass layoffs in the gaming industry, as Microsoft-owned Tango Gameworks closes (Alicia Haddick/GamesIndustry.biz)
